long_description: Inspired by a classic chukka boot, the men's Ahnu Harris Shoes features full-grain leather uppers and a Vibram&3174; outsole to provide excellent traction and durability on your day-to-day adventures. Full-grain leather uppers are lined with a moisture-wicking mesh. Numentum(TM) internal polyurethane midsole with U-shaped heel stabilizers offer neutral positioning and long-lasting comfort. Dual-density comfort polyurethane footbed has memory foam in the forefoot. Internal nylon shank provide arch- and mid-foot support. Ahnu Harris Shoes have Vibram(R) Morflex nonmarking rubber outsoles for dependable traction.
short_description: Inspired by a classic chukka boot, the men's Ahnu Harris Shoes features full-grain leather uppers and a Vibram&3174; outsole to provide excellent traction and durability on your day-to-day adventures.
